info.name: Silent Girl
info.narration: -> #0(이)가 작업을 시작하러 '아무 말 없는 소녀'의 방에 들어갑니다
info.desc: "Figure appears as a young woman carrying a hammer and a large nail.*Generally giving the look of someone with a secret, the creature keeps its hands held behind its back.*The creature has a friendly appearance and does not lead an attack, thus causes carelessness in most employees.*However, when faced with an individual who appears susceptible to fear or one that carries guilt, creature displays sudden aggression.*Creature renders opponent defenseless with its unique ambience, then brings out its secret weapon.*"
